All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class VirtualDatabaseSafeShutdownThread
extends VirtualDatabaseShutdownThread

This thread waits for open transactions to complete before shutting down the virtual database.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Emmanuel Cecchet
